name: Attorney
text: §431:4-405    Attorney as used in this part refers to the attorney-in-fact of a reciprocal insurer.  The attorney may be an individual, partnership, or corporation.  The  principal office of the attorney for a domestic reciprocal insurer shall be maintained within this State. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 2003, c 212, §37]
